aside.p: Allow Mechanical Turk players to log back in with the same HTI identifier. Moreover, don't unset mturk status (on the experimenter side) when experiments begin: mturk players can only log in after the experiment commences anyway, so this is useless. Show experimenters a message when mturk or captive players are enabled consisting of the necessary links.
Put graphs of current game into Play tab for easier reference.
